name: Launch Initiative FSW Dev (Ubuntu 24.04)
postCreateCommand: /bin/sh -lc 'cd /workspace && west --version && if [ ! -d .west ]; then west init -l FSW && west update; fi && echo "export ZEPHYR_BASE=/workspace/zephyr" | sudo tee /etc/profile.d/zephyr_base.sh >/dev/null && VENV_DIR="$HOME/.venvs/zephyr" && [ -d "$VENV_DIR" ] || python3 -m venv "$VENV_DIR" && . "$VENV_DIR/bin/activate" && pip install -U pip && [ -f zephyr/scripts/requirements.txt ] && pip install -r zephyr/scripts/requirements.txt && west zephyr-export && echo "source $HOME/.venvs/zephyr/bin/activate" >> "$HOME/.zshrc" && west --version'
